title: AI Meets Rugged Reliability: Getac Expands Its Range of Versatile Rugged Field Devices with Launch of New AI-Ready F120 Tablet and V120 Laptop
description: Getac Technology Corporation (Getac), a leading provider of rugged computing and mobile video solutions and a manufacturer with advanced in-house capabilities, today announced the launch of two highly versatile new field devices; the F120 – the world's first fully rugged Copilot+ PC in a tablet form factor1, and the V120 – an AI-ready fully rugged laptop designed to deliver a premium computing experience in challenging work environments.
content:
Both new devices build on their best-selling predecessors, introducing cutting-edge technology with larger screens and enhanced specifications tailored for industrial field professionals
• Getac's brand new F120 – the world's first fully rugged Copilot+ PC in a tablet form factor – harnesses the power of edge AI to transform workflows and optimise operational efficiency in the field.
• The new V120 is derived from years of real-world use of the V110, featuring a host of meaningful upgrades while retaining the hallmark flexible usage form factor to support diverse field operations.
• Both devices are designed to meet the needs of field professionals in sectors such as defence, utilities, manufacturing, public safety and automotive, who want to optimise their productivity in challenging working environments using the latest technology. TAIPEI, Sept. 3, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Getac Technology Corporation (Getac), a leading provider of rugged computing and mobile video solutions and a manufacturer with advanced in-house capabilities, today announced the launch of two highly versatile new field devices; the F120 – the world's first fully rugged Copilot+ PC in a tablet form factor1, and the V120 – an AI-ready fully rugged laptop designed to deliver a premium computing experience in challenging work environments. Both new devices are the result of extensive real-world research and customer dialogue, building on Getac's best-selling F110 and V110 models to deliver two brand new devices that harness the power of AI to unlock new levels of productivity in the field. Shared upgrades include larger 12.2-inch displays with a new narrow-bezel design, slimmer and lighter builds, Wi-Fi 7, Bluetooth 5.4, two ThunderboltTM 4 ports, hot-swappable batteries, TPM 2.0, and robust MIL-STD-810H / IP66 certifications, a generational leap in performance and reliability for field professionals. F120 Fully Rugged Tablet - The World's First Fully Rugged Tablet as a Copilot+ PC

Copilot+ PCs are the fastest, most intelligent Windows devices currently available, with powerful processors and access to highly advanced AI models that can fundamentally transform workflows and operations in the field. To qualify as a Copilot+ PC, a device must include an NPU (Neural Processor Unit) capable of 40+ TOPS (Trillion Operations Per Second), have a minimum of 16GB of RAM and 256GB of SSD storage, and support at least one form of biometric security authentication. Getac's new F120 meets all these criteria. By bringing powerful edge AI into a fully rugged form factor, it transforms how field professionals work in challenging environments. Powered by the latest Intel® CoreTM Ultra 200V Series Processor and groundbreaking Intel® AI Boost NPU with up to 48 TOPS, it accelerates AI-driven tasks like diagnostics, image processing, and real-time analytics, enabling users to tackle challenges faster and more effectively.

With options up to 32GB LPDDR5X memory, 2TB PCIe NVMe SSD storage, and Windows Hello facial recognition, the F120 is designed to support seamless multitasking, offers secure access features, and has the power to handle demanding workloads, making it an ideal tool for professionals in mission-critical environments such as defence, utilities and field operations that demand advanced mobile AI at the edge. V120 Fully Rugged Laptop – AI-Ready Convertible Powerhouse

Shaped by years of proven deployment across key industries, the V120 builds on Getac's top-selling V110, incorporating real-world feedback into a refined convertible-hinge design that allows the device to look like a tablet, meeting the evolving needs of frontline professionals. At the heart of the V120 is an Intel® CoreTM Ultra 200H Series processor with integrated Intel® ArcTM GPUs and Intel® Turbo Boost technology, delivering efficient AI acceleration and smooth multitasking across demanding applications. The standard configuration features 8GB of DDR5 memory and a 256GB PCIe NVMe SSD, with optional upgrades to 64GB RAM and 2TB SSD for users who require even greater capacity. Bigger Displays, Smarter Form Factors 

Both the F120 and V120 feature a larger 12.2-inch LumiBond display with Smart Touch and Getac sunlight readable technology, upgraded from 11.6 inches in their predecessors. The V120 delivers 1,000 nits of brightness for clear visibility across vehicles and mobile workstations. For outdoor-heavy use in direct sunlight, the F120 boosts brightness to 1,200 nits. With a new narrow-bezel design, both devices are thinner and lighter than the previous generation despite the increased screen size, improving mobility without compromising durability. Seamless Connectivity and Rugged Performance

Designed for always-on field operations, both devices offer Wi-Fi 7 and Bluetooth 5.4 for fast, stable wireless connectivity. Dual Thunderbolt™ 4 Type-C ports are standard on both models, with the V120 offering an optional third port for additional peripheral flexibility. For users working in remote locations, additional connectivity options include a dedicated GPS module, 4G LTE, 5G Sub-6, with Dual SIM (Nano-SIM 4FF and e-SIM). Both new devices also feature Getac's LifeSupport hot-swappable battery technology for all-day productivity, while additional high-capacity batteries are available for even longer periods of operation away from charging facilities. They also include a robust suite of data security features including TPM 2.0 as standard, with additional security options including Intel vPro® Technology, smart card reader, and Absolute Persistence® if required. Like most Getac devices, the F120 and V120 are MIL-STD-810H and IP66 certified and can operate in extreme temperatures ranging from -29°C to 63°C (-20°F to 145°F). The F120 is also drop resistant up to 6ft (1.8m), while the V120 is drop resistant up to 4ft (1.2m) and features enhanced shock-absorbing corners for additional protection. Optional salt fog certification and ANSI/UL compliance make both devices well suited for use in corrosive, regulated, and high-risk environments. Enabling High-Impact Use Across Key Industries

These powerful, yet versatile, field-ready devices are designed to help field professionals across multiple industries perform complex tasks with ease. Defence professionals can use the F120's advanced data processing and extensive connectivity to turn any vehicle into a mobile command and control centre, while the V120's slim design and flexible form factor aid critical data gathering in high pressure scenarios. Elsewhere, automotive engineers and technicians can use the F120's AI capabilities to quickly run intricate diagnostics and get vehicles back on the road as fast as possible. Public safety workers such as police officers and emergency first responders can utilise the V120's AI capabilities alongside the Getac Voice application, which enables real-time transcription of witness interviews at incident scenes, providing instant speech-to-text conversion for written reports. Witnesses can then sign reports using the device's touchscreen. "Modern field professionals need devices they can rely on to solve complex challenges and facilitate high levels of productivity in a wide variety of environments and circumstances. At Getac, we work closely with our customers to not only understand the challenges they are facing today, but also how these challenges are evolving over time, to ensure our rugged solutions continue to meet their changing needs," says James Hwang, President of Getac Technology Corporation. "The new F120 and V120 build on a proven track record of performance and raise the bar once again, combining powerful AI capabilities, larger screens and weather-resistant functionality in a slimmer, lighter form factor, for optimal field efficiency." The F120 and V120 will be available in October. For more information, please visit www.getac.com 1Status updated as of 2 September 2025; to the best of our knowledge, this product is the first fully rugged tablet as a Microsoft Copilot+ PC. About Getac

Getac Technology Corporation is a global leader in AI-capable rugged mobile technology and intelligent video solutions, including laptops, tablets, software, body-worn cameras, in-car video systems, digital evidence management and enterprise video analytics solutions. Getac's solutions and services are designed to enable extraordinary experiences for frontline workers in challenging environments. Today, Getac serves customers in over 100 countries spanning defence, public safety, ambulance, fire & rescue, utilities, automotive, natural resources, manufacturing, transport, and logistics. Getac was recently recognized as one of Newsweek's "World's Most Trustworthy Companies" for 2024. For more information, visit: https://www.getac.com. Participate in the Getac Industry blog or follow the company on LinkedIn and YouTube. Getac and Getac logo are trademarks of Getac Holdings Corporation or its affiliates. Other brands or trademarks are the property of their respective owners. ©2025 Getac Technology Corporation.
summary: Getac Technology Corporation (Getac) has launched the F120 Tablet and V120 Laptop, the world's first fully rugged Copilot+ PC in a tablet form factor, and the AI-ready fully rugged laptop designed to deliver a premium computing experience in challenging work environments. Both devices are designed to meet the needs of industrial field professionals in sectors such as defence, utilities, manufacturing, public safety and automotive. The new V120 is derived from years of real-world use of the V110 and features numerous upgrades including larger 12.2-inch displays with a new narrow-bezel design, slimmer builds, Wi-Fi 7, Bluetooth 5.4, two ThunderboltTM 4 ports, hot-swappable batteries, TPM 2.0, and robust MIL-STD-810H / IP66 certifications. The F120 is designed to support seamless multitasking and handle demanding workloads, making it ideal tool for professionals in mission-critical environments such as defense, utilities and field operations that demand advanced mobile AI at the edge. The V120 also features an Intel® CoreTM Ultra 200V Series processor and groundbreaking Intel AI Boost NPU with up to 48 TOPS, enabling it to accelerate AI-driven tasks like diagnostics, image processing, and real-time analytics, and Windows Hello facial recognition.
shortSummary: Getac launches the world's first fully rugged Copilot+ PC, the V120, with enhanced specifications for industrial field professionals, enhancing productivity and reliability.

scraped_sources.text:
GETAC F120
Discover the Getac F120, a cutting-edge solution combining rugged endurance, powerful Intel® Core™ Ultra processors, and versatile adaptability.
REVOLUTIONIZE WORKFLOWS WITH AI TABLET PRECISION
The F120 AI-powered tablet is meticulously engineered to redefine productivity. With its industrial-grade design, this device integrates AI solutions to enhance precision and streamline tasks. Built for mobile professionals, it proves indispensable in field diagnostics, manufacturing, and high-stakes environments.
This tablet empowers you to achieve more by seamlessly combining optimal performance, adaptability, and real-time communication, allowing teams to stay focused on their critical work. Whether in industrial settings or remote sites, the F120 is the ideal tool for those demanding excellence.
OPTIMAL PERFORMANCE MEETS SUPERIOR RESPONSIVENESS
Experience seamless performance with the F120 fully rugged Copilot+ PC* powered by Intel® Core™ Ultra 200V Series Processor and Intel® AI Boost. With NPU acceleration delivering up to 48 TOPS for real-time AI at the edge, it supports mission-critical processing while maintaining privacy and security, resulting in reliable operation in demanding environmental conditions.
Its dual Thunderbolt™ 4 ports enable rapid data transfer and power delivery, while expandable LPDDR5X memory, up to 32GB, ensures efficiency during multitasking. The hot-swappable batteries allow seamless functionality throughout long hours in the field. With optimized control, it delivers the performance you need to work efficiently and sustain momentum.
*Copilot is available in select global markets. Please contact your local Getac sales representative for availability and further information.
ADVANCED DISPLAY TECHNOLOGY FOR MAXIMUM VISIBILITY
The F120 features a 12.2'' LumiBond display with 1,200 nits of brightness, providing clarity even in intense sunlight. Our capacitive multi-touch display with Smart Touch auto-sensing technology effortlessly adapts to finger, glove, and stylus inputs without the need for manual mode switching. This screen technology enables precision regardless of environmental challenges such as dust or water exposure. With a sleek design, the LCD screen maintains a compact, lightweight form while maximizing the difference offered by its large display area.
SEAMLESS CONNECTIVITY AND LIMITLESS POTENTIAL
Enjoy the powerful features of Wi-Fi 7, which enables lightning-fast connections, and Bluetooth 5.4, which allows streamlined communication between devices. Optional 4G LTE and 5G Sub-6* connectivity is available with integrated GPS for accurate positioning, while a dedicated GPS is also available for standalone and high-precision location tracking - no matter where you work.
These robust connectivity solutions provide the backbone for secure, efficient, and mobile productivity, helping ensure operations remain uninterrupted in all conditions.
*Only available in the US, UK, EU, Australia, and New Zealand.
UNCOMPROMISED SECURITY
This tablet comes equipped with a comprehensive security suite, including TPM 2.0 for cryptographic protection, a Kensington lock, and Windows Hello face-authentication 5MP camera for seamless and secure biometric login. Further enhance your security setup with optional Intel® vPro® technology for remote management, a smart card reader, and an HF RFID or fingerprint reader.
Protecting sensitive digital assets is critical, and the F120 rugged tablet offers military-grade reliability that meets professional standards, designed to keep your information safe.
ENDURANCE BEYOND EXPECTATIONS
Certified to MIL-STD-810H, the F120 rugged tablet for extreme conditions is tested to withstand shock, vibration, and drops of up to six feet. Meeting IP66 certification for dust resistant and waterproof capabilities, it’s crafted to survive where traditional devices fail.
Optional compliance with ANSI/UL 121201 and CSA C22.2 NO. 213 standards, make the F120 suitable for use in Class I, Division 2, Groups A, B, C, D hazardous locations. While optional salt-fog resistance supports longevity in coastal environments. Built with exceptional durability, this industrial-grade tablet is one of the most reliable field service tablets available.
VERSATILITY UNLEASHED
With dynamic adaptability, the F120 transitions effortlessly from tablet to laptop with a robust keyboard dock for prolonged tasks or stationary work. A rugged hard handle option and tailored accessories enhance its mobility, making it a versatile powerhouse for both fieldwork and professional services.
This hybrid design allows professionals to elevate their workflow, meeting the demands of unpredictable environments. The rugged exterior, combined with these practical features, makes the F120 an ideal tool for enhanced efficiency and reliability.
Getac F120 Features
Intel® Core™ Ultra 5/7 200V Series Processor with Intel® AI Boost (Up to 48 TOPS)
Dedicated GPS
Wi-Fi 7 BE201 & Bluetooth 5.4
Operational between -29°C to 63°C
Up to 32GB DDR5X / Up to 2TB Storage
3-year Bumper-to-Bumper warranty
1200 nits WUXGA (1920 x 1200) LumiBond multi-touch display
Trusted Platform Module 2.0
Industries Using F120
Public Safety
Industrial Manufacturing
Beyond Expectations.
Our new Bumper-to-Bumper fully rugged warranties go beyond the expected to protect your productivity.
3 Years Warranty
Accidents can take your equipment out of service when you least expect it, especially in a rugged environment, which can cause costly equipment downtime. That is why Getac has introduced accidental damage under our Bumper-to-Bumper warranty, to help minimize your enterprise IT costs. Bumper-to-Bumper is your hassle-free guarantee. That means you can depend on us to have your unit back in service within days.
3 Years Bumper-to-Bumper
For full details of the warranty protection, see the Terms and Conditions.
For Australia, see the Terms and Conditions.
*Images shown are for reference only. Actual product may vary due to product enhancement.

Vi använder cookies och data för att
- leverera och underhålla Googles tjänster
- spåra avbrott och skydda mot spam, bedrägeri och otillåten användning
- mäta målgruppsengagemang och webbplatsstatistik så att vi kan analysera hur våra tjänster används och förbättra tjänsternas kvalitet.
Om du väljer knappen Godkänn alla använder vi även cookies och data för att
- utveckla och förbättra nya tjänster
- leverera annonser och mäta hur effektiva de är
- visa anpassat innehåll utifrån dina inställningar
- visa anpassade annonser utifrån dina inställningar
Om du väljer knappen Avvisa alla använder vi inte cookies i dessa ytterligare syften.
Innehåll och annonser utan anpassning påverkas bland annat av vad du tittar på för tillfället och din plats (annonser visas utifrån din ungefärliga plats). Innehåll och annonser med anpassning kan även omfatta sådant som videorekommendationer, en anpassad YouTube Hem-sida och anpassade annonser utifrån tidigare aktivitet, till exempel vad du tittar på och söker efter på YouTube. Vi använder även cookies och data för att anpassa upplevelsen efter lämplighet för din målgrupp, om tillämpligt.
Välj knappen Fler alternativ för mer information, till exempel om hur du hanterar dina integritetsinställningar. Du kan även besöka g.co/privacytools när som helst.

About us
Getac Technology Corporation is a key subsidiary of Getac Holdings Corporation (TWSE:3005), part of the MiTAC-Synnex Business Group. Getac was established in 1989 as a joint venture with GE Aerospace to provide defence electronics. Today Getac’s business includes rugged laptops, rugged tablets, software, and mobile video solutions for defence, police, firefighters, utilities, automotive, manufacturing, transport and logistics.

-
🔥🔥 The wait is over! #Getac is proud to unveil the latest fully rugged devices for field professionals who demand mobility, intelligence, and uncompromising performance. Meet the F120 tablet and V120 laptop, built to take AI-rugged innovation to the next level, from command vehicles to remote field sites. #V120 12.2 inch Fully Rugged Laptop 💻 🔄 Convertible-hinge design for enhanced field workflow 🗣️ AI-powered feature for hands-free productivity 🛡️ Mission-ready durability #F120 12.2 inch Fully Rugged Tablet 📱 The world’s first fully rugged Copilot+ PC in a tablet form factor ☀️ Ultra-bright display for outdoor readability ⚡ Lightweight for all-day mobility 🤖 Edge-AI for faster operations Explore Getac V120: https://bit.ly/3HW4erw Explore Getac F120: https://bit.ly/47VC22s
-
Finding an effective way to identify underground pipelines and electric wires is essential, yet often complex, for utilities fieldwork. See if you can spot 5 key words hidden in this Getac word puzzle! These words highlight how field professionals use Getac’s reliable ARCore-certified #rugged tablets with mobile GIS to view schematics and spatial #data on-site—enabling #efficient surveying, streamlined mapping, and #faster access to critical data for more #precise decisions. 📊 Found them all? Discover more about Getac rugged solutions: https://bit.ly/45kmDqX
-
In challenging industries, integrating #AR and #GIS on a rugged tablet enables field workers to visualize critical data, eliminating guesswork and accelerating decision-making in the field. Getac #ZX10 is ready to integrate AR technology with GIS. This Google #ARCore certified rugged tablet brings real-time spatial data overlays to the job site, enabling field professionals to visualize infrastructure instantly and enhance operational efficiency. Learn more🔗 https://bit.ly/3HZPstY
-
Why do frontline teams need efficient AR solutions? In manufacturing environments, accuracy and access to real-time information are critical for facility management and inspections. ⚙️ Built to military-grade standards, Getac rugged, AI-ready tablets like the #ZX80 and #ZX10 provide a reliable, high-performance platform for AR integration on the factory floor. These rugged tablets support both #AR and #VR, helping workers quickly identify assets, access data, and complete tasks with greater precision and speed. Learn more: https://bit.ly/4ohR88b
-
As Augmented Reality (#AR) continues to play a growing role in field operations and enterprise workflows, we are pleased to announce that Getac rugged tablets—including the #ZX80, #ZX10, and #ZX10EX—are now Google #ARCore certified. This certification verifies that these rugged tablets are ready to: 🌐 Seamlessly deploy proprietary and third-party AR applications without additional setup 🎯 Deliver precise AR experiences for workflow guidance, remote support, training, and GIS visualization in the field 🛡️ Operate reliably under military-grade durability and protection standards for enterprise AR integration Learn more about our ARCore-certified rugged tablets: 👉ZX80: https://bit.ly/3UtHWjr 👉ZX10: https://bit.ly/4h8va3a 👉ZX10-EX: https://bit.ly/4lloMIk
-
What an energizing day at the Tech for Safer Communities seminar in Malaysia! We had the privilege of hearing firsthand from public safety experts and first responders about the real-world challenges they face on the frontline — and we’re proud that Getac is part of the conversation, offering rugged solutions that truly make a difference. Partnered with Gamber-Johnson LLC and CUTZ TECHNOLOGIES SDN BHD, the Getac team, Jeff Huang, Allen Cheng, Dannis Lee, and Given Chang had meaningful discussions with local professionals to explore the right-fit technologies that support safer, smarter, and more responsive operations. A huge thank you to everyone who stopped by, shared insights, and joined us in our mission to build safer communities across the region. Let’s keep the momentum going! Want to see our solutions in action? Visit our website to explore. https://lnkd.in/gfKQ4ZDF
-
+4
-
From drone surveillance to object detection, the Getac #B360Pro is purpose-built for #defense professionals who require secure, reliable command and control in dynamic environments. 🪖 Engineered with military-grade durability and integrated #AI acceleration, this fully rugged laptop empowers with real-time intelligence, accelerated data integration, and secure communications to support mission-critical decisions. AI Meets Rugged Reliability: Getac Expands Its Range of Versatile Rugged Field Devices with Launch of New AI-Ready F120 Tablet and V120 Laptop
Both new devices build on their best-selling predecessors, introducing cutting-edge technology with larger screens and enhanced specifications tailored for industrial field professionals
News in brief:
- Getac's brand new F120 – the world's first fully rugged Copilot+ PC in a tablet form factor – harnesses the power of edge AI to transform workflows and optimise operational efficiency in the field.
- The new V120 is derived from years of real-world use of the V110, featuring a host of meaningful upgrades while retaining the hallmark flexible usage form factor to support diverse field operations.
- Both devices are designed to meet the needs of field professionals in sectors such as defence, utilities, manufacturing, public safety and automotive, who want to optimise their productivity in challenging working environments using the latest technology.
TAIPEI, Sept. 3, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Getac Technology Corporation (Getac), a leading provider of rugged computing and mobile video solutions and a manufacturer with advanced in-house capabilities, today announced the launch of two highly versatile new field devices; the F120 – the world's first fully rugged Copilot+ PC in a tablet form factor1, and the V120 – an AI-ready fully rugged laptop designed to deliver a premium computing experience in challenging work environments.
Both new devices are the result of extensive real-world research and customer dialogue, building on Getac's best-selling F110 and V110 models to deliver two brand new devices that harness the power of AI to unlock new levels of productivity in the field. Shared upgrades include larger 12.2-inch displays with a new narrow-bezel design, slimmer and lighter builds, Wi-Fi 7, Bluetooth 5.4, two ThunderboltTM 4 ports, hot-swappable batteries, TPM 2.0, and robust MIL-STD-810H / IP66 certifications, a generational leap in performance and reliability for field professionals.
F120 Fully Rugged Tablet - The World's First Fully Rugged Tablet as a Copilot+ PC
Copilot+ PCs are the fastest, most intelligent Windows devices currently available, with powerful processors and access to highly advanced AI models that can fundamentally transform workflows and operations in the field. To qualify as a Copilot+ PC, a device must include an NPU (Neural Processor Unit) capable of 40+ TOPS (Trillion Operations Per Second), have a minimum of 16GB of RAM and 256GB of SSD storage, and support at least one form of biometric security authentication.
Getac's new F120 meets all these criteria. By bringing powerful edge AI into a fully rugged form factor, it transforms how field professionals work in challenging environments. Powered by the latest Intel® CoreTM Ultra 200V Series Processor and groundbreaking Intel® AI Boost NPU with up to 48 TOPS, it accelerates AI-driven tasks like diagnostics, image processing, and real-time analytics, enabling users to tackle challenges faster and more effectively.
With options up to 32GB LPDDR5X memory, 2TB PCIe NVMe SSD storage, and Windows Hello facial recognition, the F120 is designed to support seamless multitasking, offers secure access features, and has the power to handle demanding workloads, making it an ideal tool for professionals in mission-critical environments such as defence, utilities and field operations that demand advanced mobile AI at the edge.
V120 Fully Rugged Laptop – AI-Ready Convertible Powerhouse
Shaped by years of proven deployment across key industries, the V120 builds on Getac's top-selling V110, incorporating real-world feedback into a refined convertible-hinge design that allows the device to look like a tablet, meeting the evolving needs of frontline professionals.
At the heart of the V120 is an Intel® CoreTM Ultra 200H Series processor with integrated Intel® ArcTM GPUs and Intel® Turbo Boost technology, delivering efficient AI acceleration and smooth multitasking across demanding applications. The standard configuration features 8GB of DDR5 memory and a 256GB PCIe NVMe SSD, with optional upgrades to 64GB RAM and 2TB SSD for users who require even greater capacity.
Bigger Displays, Smarter Form Factors
Both the F120 and V120 feature a larger 12.2-inch LumiBond display with Smart Touch and Getac sunlight readable technology, upgraded from 11.6 inches in their predecessors. The V120 delivers 1,000 nits of brightness for clear visibility across vehicles and mobile workstations. For outdoor-heavy use in direct sunlight, the F120 boosts brightness to 1,200 nits. With a new narrow-bezel design, both devices are thinner and lighter than the previous generation despite the increased screen size, improving mobility without compromising durability.
Seamless Connectivity and Rugged Performance
Designed for always-on field operations, both devices offer Wi-Fi 7 and Bluetooth 5.4 for fast, stable wireless connectivity. Dual Thunderbolt™ 4 Type-C ports are standard on both models, with the V120 offering an optional third port for additional peripheral flexibility. For users working in remote locations, additional connectivity options include a dedicated GPS module, 4G LTE, 5G Sub-6, with Dual SIM (Nano-SIM 4FF and e-SIM).
Both new devices also feature Getac's LifeSupport hot-swappable battery technology for all-day productivity, while additional high-capacity batteries are available for even longer periods of operation away from charging facilities. They also include a robust suite of data security features including TPM 2.0 as standard, with additional security options including Intel vPro® Technology, smart card reader, and Absolute Persistence® if required.
Like most Getac devices, the F120 and V120 are MIL-STD-810H and IP66 certified and can operate in extreme temperatures ranging from -29°C to 63°C (-20°F to 145°F). The F120 is also drop resistant up to 6ft (1.8m), while the V120 is drop resistant up to 4ft (1.2m) and features enhanced shock-absorbing corners for additional protection. Optional salt fog certification and ANSI/UL compliance make both devices well suited for use in corrosive, regulated, and high-risk environments.
Enabling High-Impact Use Across Key Industries
These powerful, yet versatile, field-ready devices are designed to help field professionals across multiple industries perform complex tasks with ease. Defence professionals can use the F120's advanced data processing and extensive connectivity to turn any vehicle into a mobile command and control centre, while the V120's slim design and flexible form factor aid critical data gathering in high pressure scenarios. Elsewhere, automotive engineers and technicians can use the F120's AI capabilities to quickly run intricate diagnostics and get vehicles back on the road as fast as possible. Public safety workers such as police officers and emergency first responders can utilise the V120's AI capabilities alongside the Getac Voice application, which enables real-time transcription of witness interviews at incident scenes, providing instant speech-to-text conversion for written reports. Witnesses can then sign reports using the device's touchscreen.
"Modern field professionals need devices they can rely on to solve complex challenges and facilitate high levels of productivity in a wide variety of environments and circumstances. At Getac, we work closely with our customers to not only understand the challenges they are facing today, but also how these challenges are evolving over time, to ensure our rugged solutions continue to meet their changing needs," says James Hwang, President of Getac Technology Corporation. "The new F120 and V120 build on a proven track record of performance and raise the bar once again, combining powerful AI capabilities, larger screens and weather-resistant functionality in a slimmer, lighter form factor, for optimal field efficiency."
The F120 and V120 will be available in October.
For more information, please visit www.getac.com
1Status updated as of 2 September 2025; to the best of our knowledge, this product is the first fully rugged tablet as a Microsoft Copilot+ PC. |
About Getac
Getac Technology Corporation is a global leader in AI-capable rugged mobile technology and intelligent video solutions, including laptops, tablets, software, body-worn cameras, in-car video systems, digital evidence management and enterprise video analytics solutions. Getac's solutions and services are designed to enable extraordinary experiences for frontline workers in challenging environments. Today, Getac serves customers in over 100 countries spanning defence, public safety, ambulance, fire & rescue, utilities, automotive, natural resources, manufacturing, transport, and logistics. Getac was recently recognized as one of Newsweek's "World's Most Trustworthy Companies" for 2024. For more information, visit: https://www.getac.com. Participate in the Getac Industry blog or follow the company on LinkedIn and YouTube.
Getac and Getac logo are trademarks of Getac Holdings Corporation or its affiliates. Other brands or trademarks are the property of their respective owners. ©2025 Getac Technology Corporation.

Getac F110
The F110 is the solution of choice for field professionals seeking complete office computing capabilities in a tablet form factor, delivering power and rugged performance in challenging environments.
NOTHING HELD BACK
The new F110 fully-rugged Windows tablet is built for maintenance, inspection, and field service personnel who need powerful computing capabilities without sacrificing mobility. Its 11.6-inch (up to 1,200 nits) display provides clear viewing in direct sunlight, while dual-SIM 4G/5G Sub 6 capabilities keep you connected at remote worksites.
UNCOMPROMISED PERFORMANCE
The new F110 delivers more power, connectivity, and media capabilities than ever before. Its 13th generation Intel® Core™ CPU, with Intel® UHD Graphics runs the latest Edge AI and AR/VR applications smoothly. Its onboard DDR5 memory (up to 32GB) processes large data volumes continuously over long workdays. Thunderbolt™ 4 Type-C enables secure and speedy transfer of that data.
Industry 4.0, powered by Intel
SUPERB OUTDOOR MEDIA CAPABILITIES
F110’s 11.6-inch touchscreen display delivers a brilliant 1,200 nits of screen brightness, enabling clear outdoor reading, video, and AR overlay on even the brightest days. Its five and eight (front/rear) megapixel cameras provide image and clarity. And if challenging weather should hit, multitouch device input (via touch, glove, or pen) enables easy usage in cold, rain, or snow.
CONTINUOUS OPERATION
Dual hot-swappable batteries, with standard and high-capacity options available, keep F110 operating well into overtime thanks to the toolless battery changeout that doesn’t interrupt operation. Dual SIM capabilities enable easy carrier network switching. And when you hand the device over for one of your coworkers to use, the solid-state drive (SSD) can also be changed out without tools.
COMPREHENSIVE WIRELESS
F110 is built to meet all your mobile wireless needs, with higher speed and more power efficiency. Wi-Fi 6E and an optional 5G Sub-6 capabilities deliver precise navigation and ample throughput while supporting 4G LTE module with an integrated GPS providing coverage for most regions, or dedicated GPS is also available. Bluetooth 5.3 handles low-power Internet of things (IoT) connections, with RF passthrough for GPS, WWAN, and WLAN, all controllable using our proprietary G-Manager software.
ADAPTABLE & FLEXIBLE
The F110 is designed for convenience. With its thin and light chassis, optional hard handle, attachable keyboard, as well as office and vehicle docks, plus a range of straps and harnesses, the F110 is a master of adaptation. A tablet in the field. A laptop at the office. The F110 works however you need it to, wherever you need it to, without compromising capability or comfort.
CERTIFIED FULLY RUGGED
Getac is a dedicated rugged device specialist. Engineered to survive the shock, rain, vibration, dust, liquid, and other diverse stresses, the IP66-certified F110 can be operated safely in the presence of rain or high-pressure water jets while also being certified for a 6-ft drop rating and operation in extreme temperatures from -29°C to 63°C (-20°F to 145°F) according to MIL-STD-810H standards, with salt fog resistance also available.
ROBUST DEVICE AND DATA SECURITY
The F110 enables enhanced data security and configurability for industries such as Defense, Manufacturing, Utilities, Oil and Gas, and more, which offer all the measures expected of an industrial device without disruption, hindrance, or friction with your work. Multi-factor authentication is supported via Intel® vPro® technology, fingerprint reader, Windows Hello facial recognition, smart card reader, and HF RFID reader, while TPM 2.0 and the user-removable, hardware-encrypted SSD add a further layer of security for your sensitive data.
Getac F110 Features
13th Generation Intel® Core™ i5/i7 Processor
Wi-Fi 6E AX211 & Bluetooth 5.3
8GB DDR5 / 256 GB Storage
1200 nits FHD 11.6” LumiBond touchscreen display
Dedicated GPS
Operational between -29°C to 63°C
3-year Bumper-to-Bumper warranty
Trusted Platform Module 2.0

Our new Bumper-to-Bumper fully rugged warranties go beyond the expected to protect your productivity.
3 Years Warranty
Accidents can take your equipment out of service when you least expect it, especially in a rugged environment, which can cause costly equipment downtime. That is why Getac has introduced accidental damage under our Bumper-to-Bumper warranty, to help minimize your enterprise IT costs. Bumper-to-Bumper is your hassle-free guarantee. That means you can depend on us to have your unit back in service within days.

Getac V110
The 11.6-inch laptop offers compact ruggedness that helps you perform with confidence in all rain or shine scenarios.
STEADFAST PERFORMANCE
The new V110 features a powerful 12th Generation Intel® Core™ i7/i5 vPro® processor, and Intel® Iris® Xe Graphics. Thunderbolt™ 4 compatibility enables seamless connectivity to edge devices. Wi-Fi 6E with Bluetooth 5.3 and optional LTE-Advanced further unleash bandwidths.
Industry 4.0, powered by Intel
LEVELED-UP USER EXPERIENCE
The V110 Windows 11 Pro Microsoft Operating System is user-intuitive and designed for hybrid, and remote work multitasks. In outdoor settings, the V110's 11.6" LumiBond screen delivers superb color and contrast, and upgraded 1,000 nits sunlight-readable brightness. The optional glove-capable capacitive multitouch screen operates in the cold and rain.
SEAMLESS CONNECTIVITY
The V110 is equipped with Bluetooth 5.3, Intel® Wi-Fi 6E AX211, optional 4G LTE, to enable continuous low-latency streaming in both dense, urban and remote locations. Optional 5G Sub-6 and optional discrete GPS are also available.
ENCOMPASSING DATA SECURITY
The V110 offers an extensive suite of Intel® vPro® and TPM 2.0 security features that safeguard the private key generated by Windows Hello. A smart card reader with an optional Windows Hello face-authentication camera (or FHD webcam), fingerprint reader, and HF RFID reader are available to emulate features of Windows Hello.
TENACIOUS RUGGEDNESS
The V110 fully rugged laptop signifies Getac's engineering and manufacturing excellence. This fully-rugged laptop is MIL-STD-810H, MIL-STD-461G, and IP65-certified to withstand temperatures from -29°C to 63°C (-20°F to 145°F). The V110 meets ANSI/UL 12.12.01 standards for Class 1 Division 2 hazardous locations and has an optional salt fog certification.

Getac V120
The V120 Fully Rugged Laptop is an AI PC, built for high-performance and rugged use, built to withstand harsh environments and meet the needs of professionals in challenging conditions.
A RUGGED SOLUTION FOR CRITICAL MISSIONS
Designed to excel where others falter, the V120 Fully Rugged Laptop stands as a durable and powerful companion for professionals operating in demanding environments. With cutting-edge technology and rugged design, the V120 is built to tackle the challenges of extreme settings while maintaining high-level performance, efficiency, and reliability.
UNCOMPROMISING PERFORMANCE
Equipped with the latest Intel® Core™ Ultra processors (Series 2) and Intel® Arc Graphics, the V120 redefines processing power, enabling seamless multitasking with AI-optimized performance. Thunderbolt™ 4 enables ultra-fast data transfer and versatile connectivity, while dedicated options like 5G Sub-6 and Wi-Fi 7 deliver next-generation networking speeds.
SUPERIOR VISIBILITY
Experience a display engineered for clarity in challending environments. The V120 features a 12.2-inch widescreen LumiBond display with Getac's sunlight-readable technology, offering up to 1,000 nits of brightness. The new touch mode setting with auto sensor feature automatically detects and adjusts to the input source - whether it's gloves, a stylus, or bare fingers - eliminating the need to manually switch touch modes and adapting to your needs in real-time.
END-TO-END SECURITY
Your data is priceless, and the V120 is designed to help protect it across your workflow. Backed by TPM 2.0 (applied to selected regions) and multifactor authentication options such as a fingerprint reader, RFID reader, and Windows Hello face authentication, the V120 places your security at the forefront. Optional Absolute® Persistence® enhances endpoint security for comprehensive peace of mind.
RELENTLESS RELIABILITY
The V120 is built to survive and thrive in extreme conditions. Certified to MIL-STD-810H, MIL-STD-461G, and IP66 standards, it is resistant to water, dust, vibration, and drops from up to 4 feet. With an operating temperature range of -29°C to 63°C (-20°F to 145°F) and an optional salt fog certification, the V120 is engineered for reliability wherever your mission takes you. Its hot-swappable dual battery design help ensure continuous operation with batteries that can be swapped without interruptions. An optional high-capacity battery is also available for extended operation when needed.
Getac V120 Features
AI Ready Intel® Core™ Ultra 5/7 Processor (Series 2)
Intel® Arc™ Graphics
4G LTE / 5G Sub-6 4X4 MIMO
Wi-Fi 7 BE200 (802.11be) and Bluetooth 5.4
1000 nits WUXGA 12.2” Touchscreen Display
Dual Thunderbolt™ 4
Operational between -29 °C to +63 °C (-20°F to 145°F)

Accidents can take your equipment out of service when you least expect it, especially in a rugged environment, which can cause costly equipment downtime. That is why Getac has introduced accidental damage as standard under our Bumper-to-Bumper warranty, to help minimise your enterprise IT costs. Bumper-to-Bumper is your hassle-free guarantee. That means you can depend on us to have your unit back in service within days.

argos_summary: Getac announced the launch of its new F120 tablet and V120 laptop, both fully rugged and AI‑ready, aimed at field professionals in defence, utilities, manufacturing, public safety and automotive sectors. The F120 is the first fully rugged Copilot+ PC in tablet form, featuring an Intel Core Ultra processor, AI Boost NPU, 12.2‑inch display, Wi‑Fi 7, and MIL‑STD‑810H/IP66 certification. The V120 builds on the V110 with upgraded Intel Core Ultra processors, Arc GPU, 12.2‑inch display, Wi‑Fi 7, 5G, and similar rugged specs. Both devices offer hot‑swappable batteries, TPM 2.0, and enhanced connectivity, targeting mission‑critical, mobile AI workloads in harsh environments.
